metadata.title: CVE-2022-0118 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in WebShare in Google Chrome prior to97.0.4692.71 allowed a remote attacker to potentially hide the contents ofthe Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
